About this site

This document aims at providing all relevant background information and instructions on how to use the integrated library and documentation management system 'ABCD'. Both the basic operations and the advanced management of the software are discussed, as are useful and necessary topics concerning the ISIS-software on which ABCD is based.
The content of this site is based on the book "The abc of ABCD" by Egbert de Smet and extended with documents produced by Bireme plus some data collection through the Internet with the aim of unifying in one place all the documentation produced for the best use of the ABCD. ## Table of Contents

Support

If you get any questions about any page in this manual, don't hesitate to open an edit on the right side of each page. You only need to have a Github account to participate.

If your question is about how ABCD itself works, open a call at this link.

To explain your question, use screenshots and describe in detail the action you are doing
